title: Looking for casual players to join our Ranked team (gold+)
body:
Sup yo,

We're looking for casual players to join our ranked team. When I say casual I mean, we only made the team to get to gold/plat for end of season rewards.

We probably play like 3-4 times a week depending what everyone is doing (we all play other games).

Team is pretty much all from Perth.

Preferably players that can fill all roles, as we like to change positions up here and there.

Please post your rank below.

replies.body:
Plat 5 here Mr Froggy

Top: rene, Malphite, Mundo
Mid, Kat Talon Xerath, Oriana
Jg Shaco rek sai lee
Support Nami (main) leona Janna Tresh Taric

Hey i'm gold 1, basically cause i don't play ranked solo that much but i would be keen to join a 5v5 team n get the plat rewards n shit, ad me God Krattos


Tops - Darius, Renek, Vlad
Mid - Kat, Talon
JG - Wu kong (main)
Sup - blitz,morg,leo
Adc - Ez
